title.en: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure - Dio's Bizarre Adventure (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

description.en: In the hopes of pleasing his childhood friend and crush, Chiharu, Arata agreed to help her clean out an old warehouse from her grandfather. But what neither of them knew was that the warehouse contained "tsukumogami" ancient objects imbued with life. When Arata accidentally broke the seal on a box containing an artifact that hungered for vengeance against humanity, Chiharu was kidnapped! Now it is up to Arata and the good, loyal artifacts to rescue Chiharu before it is too late!
description.pt-br: Na esperança de agradar a seu amigo de infância e paixão, Chiharu, Arata concorda em ajudá-la a limpar um antigo armazém de seu avô. Mas o que nenhum deles sabia era que o armazém continha "Tsukumogami" objetos antigos imbuídos de vida. Quando Arata acidentalmente quebrou o selo em uma caixa contendo um artefato que ansiava por vingança contra a humanidade, Chiharu foi sequestrada! Agora cabe a Arata e os bons artefatos fiéis para resgatar Chiharu antes que seja tarde demais!

description.en:
As boys, they always made fun of the person rumored to live in a quiet, old house, even though they never saw her.  
  
Now, years later, one of them wonders if that person is still alive and approaches the house.

During the reign of Philip IV of France, Acre is in the midst of a war between the invading Mamluks and the Knights Templar trying to protect the Holy Land. On the day when Lea's family decided to leave by boat to escape the threat of war, Lea is forced to go into the middle of the war to return the sword entrusted to her by the leader of the Knights Templar. However, when she arrives trembling with the sword firmly strapped to her back, she witnesses the leader's death, and in a moment of danger, she meets Balta, the beautiful knight she had dreamed of since childhood. But this was not the time for her to indulge in such sentiments. The sword had lost its owner, and the atmosphere in the Knights Templar is somewhat strange. “It’s dangerous to go alone, I will take you there.” --Written by the same author as The Golden Forest--

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

altTitles.ja: 怪 ～ayakashi～ 化猫 モノノ怪前日譚

description.en:
Set in the Edo period, Mononoke tells the story of a supernatural horror that lays siege to an aristocratic household, and of a mysterious apothecary who seeks to uncover the ugly truths that gave rise to the monstrosity in order to vanquish it before it destroys them all.

---

Published in 2007 & 2019.
description.ja: 「モノノ怪」シリーズその原点『化猫』、新装版で登場!江戸時代の武家・坂井家。この家にはなぜか、猫がいない。孫娘の輿入れが行われようとしたその日、花嫁は無残にも惨殺される。次々と起こる怪死事件。屋敷に居合わせた、謎の薬売りは告げる。これは化猫の仕業だと…。はじまりの物語『化猫』、ここに開帳。

altTitles.th: ชมรมรั่วมหากาฬ!

description.en:
Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?  


---
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15705)
description.ru: Печально известный главарь банды Казама Кенжи наталкивается на группу странных девчонок, воображающих, что они владеют магией стихий. В итоге девчонки шантажируют его, чтобы он вступил в их клуб. Итак, приключения начинаются…
description.pt-br: Kazama Kenji acredita que ele é mais ou menos um delinquente. Além disso, outras pessoas parecem acreditar que ele é. Claro, a gangue do Kenji se encontra com um grupo de quatro garotas nada normais—Chitose, Sakura, Minami e Roka—de uma vez só, qualquer reputação que ele tenha não é nada comparado ao comportamento escandaloso das garotas. Forçados a se juntarem ao grupo delas, o que acontecerá com o seu dia-a-dia apartir de agora?

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

description.en: After Mitsuhashi’s family moves into a new neighborhood, he decides to use the opportunity to become a delinquent. Upon meeting Itou he finds out that he wasn’t the only one who had this idea. Making friends and foes along the way will these two take over their school or just end up as wannabes?

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

The family crumbled like a sand castle in the blink of an eye after their father's suicide. I became the head of the family and had to take responsibility for my mother who lost her mind and my blind little sister who goes to a special school. For the sake of my family, I'm going to start my own gang at the strongest gang school in Busan. Hot action for a cold world.
description.ru: Семья рассыпалась в мгновение ока, словно замок из песка, после самоубийства отца. Я стал главой семьи и мне пришлось взять ответственность за потерявшую рассудок мать и слепую младшую сестру, которая ходит в специальную школу. Ради семьи я собираюсь создать свою собственную банду в самой сильной гангстерской школе в Пусане. Горячий экшн для холодного мира.

description.en:
Young sorceress Lina Inverse and her dim-witted sidekick Gourry Gabriev travel through a somewhat medieval setting, doing good and fighting evil. Well, by "doing good and fighting evil" I mean "stealing from corrupt rich people and blowing things up".  
  
The stories in this volume are occasional tie-ins to the novels and short stories.

Tankoubon originally released in 1995
Shinsouban released in 2001

Shinsouban on Amazon https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0093T6LUM

A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control them, grows up seeing 
the dark side of the humans that rejected him, and vows to become humanity's greatest enemy.

Gai Sakurai is the head of the Osaragi clan of the Kikaku family, a gangster organization based in Yokohama. While he is leading a small but highly individualistic clan, an incident breaks out. A young member of the Kikaku family is murdered. Behind the murder is the Akane clan, a rival clan within the Kikaku family. And then there is the existence of the "Tokugawa's buried treasure" in the abyss…… A terrifying tale of intersecting desires, violence, and fate is about to begin…!

description.en: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.
description.ja:
不眠症に悩む高校二年生・半崎獏也はある日、深夜の公園でカップ焼きそばをおいしそうに食べる後輩少女・小比類巻君鳥と出会う。獏也がぐっすり眠れるよう手伝いをすると言う彼女は、自分の家に来てほしいといきなり提案してきて！？
「女子の部屋に入って、いきなりクンクンと匂いを嗅ぐなんて流石先輩ですね」「……せーんぱい。おっぱい見過ぎです」と、隙あらば獏也をおちょくる君鳥ちゃんから耳元でエッチな言葉を囁かれたり添い寝したりと長い夜を過ごすことになり――！
description.es-la: Bakuya, un estudiante de segundo de bachillerato que padece insomnio, sin embargo, una noche conoce a Kimidori, una chica de tercero que le gusta comer fideos yakisoba de taza. Kimidori dice que puede ayudar a Bakuya a dormir, no obstante, le gusta gastarle bromas cada vez que ella tiene la oportunidad.

description.en:
One day in a sunny leisure day, a woman visited my house and asked me if I'm interested in managing a dungeon along with support from a goddess. But of course, I refused. Eh? I shouldn't ignore a person in trouble, moreover if it's a beautiful woman? No way, that's too bothersome and why do I have to do that? I'm perfectly satisfied with my comfortable life now, throwing it away is just overly stupid… Sigh, fine.   
So I just go to another world, become a dungeon master, manage a dungeon, and deal with a mana circulation problem? Understood, but how to do it? Let me show you how…
description.ru: Однажды солнечным днём, мою обитель посетила женщина, её интересовало не хочу ли я управлять подземельем, заручившись при этом поддержкой богини. Естественно, я отказался. Я поступил верно, разве не так? А? Не стоит отказывать человеку в беде, особенно красивой женщине? Исключено, это слишком хлопотно, зачем мне в это ввязываться? Я живу спокойной жизнью и меня это вполне устраивает, разрушить эту идиллию было бы верхом безрассудства… Ай, ну хорошо, отправлюсь в новый мир, стану хозяином подземелья, буду управлять им и иметь дело с проблемами циркуляции маны? Понял, но как с этим справиться?

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
description.pt-br: Suguru e Kakeru são dois irmãos que jogam futebol como ninguém. Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. O que poderá acontecer para que Kakeru mude de ideia e volte a ajudar o time de dentro de campo, onde seu irmão o espera??

description.ja: 怪奇現象や幽霊の目撃情報が絶えない呪われし丑光高等学校。この学校に赴任してきた教師・園 渚のクラスには丑光高校に伝わる百七不思議のひとつ、物部スイカという小学生（？）が居座っていた。オカルト的な噂を一切信じない園だったが、スイカに気に入られたことで不可解で笑えるトラブルに巻き込まれていく!!

description.en:
The main character is reborn as a character from a game he played in his previous life. This character falls into ruin along with the villainess, spending the last of their years together. A man named Kururi Helan. No details of this decline is written inside the game, it can´t be understood why this sub-character ended up with the villainess route. However, that is of no importance. Living as a needy farmer along with someone is unpleasant, so the main character seeks a profession. For now, he aims for becoming a blacksmith as he originally had skill in it. The popular light novel now in manga form!

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

title.en: Gambling Outcast Kaiji: The One Poker Arc - Kaiji Part 5

altTitles.ja: 賭博堕天録 カイジ ワン・ポーカー編

description.en: After adding Chang and Mario, whose lives he saved in the Salvation Game, to his team, Kaiji arrives at the Teiai warehouse to face off with Kazuya, the son of Teiai Group Chairman Hyoudou. Kazuya begins to explain "One Poker," a gambling game where players play a single card on a machine called "Mother Sophie." Kaiji is stunned by Kazuya's proposal of "one bet of 200 million = one life." The ultimate death match, a gambling game that goes beyond the norm, is about to begin!
description.ru:
После «Спасительной игры» и маджонга «Семнадцать шагов» Кайдзи Ито, имея на руках 400 000 000 йен, решается сыграть в ещё одну игру под названием «Ван Покер» с Кадзуей Хёдо. Кадзуя ставит два миллиарда йен! За кем же будет победа?

(Source: readmanga)

description.en:
Reincarnated into a novel where my favorite character breathes and lives.

The beauty claimed to be the most beautiful in the continent. The jewel most cherished by the Emperor. The queen of the social circles. The time bomb of the Imperial Palace. I became Princess Agnes Saint, the one with all these titles and descriptions!

It’s nice being from a rich royal family, but… Like Draco Malfoy who scorned Muggles in Harry Potter, the problem was that ‘I’ was the despised tr*sh that insulted my favorite character’s integrity.

To make matters worse, she’s hopelessly courting another man. ‘My favorite character is Kylo, the male lead’s rival, and now I’ve reincarnated as a hardcore fan of the male lead…’

But now that it’s come to this… I will, at all costs, by any means possible, prevent my favorite character’s death and pave a flower path for him!

But if I suddenly reveal myself as a Kylo fan, everyone would think I’ve lost my mind. Kylo himself would suspect I’m a madwoman.

I didn’t want my kitten, Kylo, to be shocked in any way. So for now, I must hide this agonizing affection.

Plus, revealing that you’re a fan has never done any good. So for the time being, I will perfectly…

‘Hide it.’

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.en: I Want To Tell You How Much I Like You

altTitles.th: เหรียญทองแดงปราบพิภพ

description.en: The monk, Xuan Min, having lost all his memories yet retaining some skill in fengshui, geomancy and other arts,  on the first day in Ningyang, unceremoniously raided a cursed mansion, and incidentally also dragged out the true dragon, Xue Xian, hiding within. Here begins the story of the half-paralysed dragon, Xue Xian, and the cold and haughty monk, Xuan Min, joining efforts to search out the dragon bones and lost memories.
description.es-la:
En su primer día en NingYang, el monje XuanMin, que había perdido por completo su
memoria, pero que tenía algunos conocimientos sobre el agua y la geomancia, asaltó sin pensarlo una maligna mansión y, de paso, al verdadero dragón Xue Xian, que se encontraba en su interior. A partir de ahí, la historia de Xue Xian, un dragón medio
paralizado, y XuanMin, un monje de gran espíritu, comienza con la búsqueda de sus huesos y sus recuerdos.

description.en: A collection of stories between two boys when they were still students.

In this world, the concept of levels exist. Other than those who live off defeating monsters, most people are only around Level 1 to 5. What's more, not just anyone can go out to hunt monsters; it's heavily influenced by one's role appointed by God. There are eight such eligible roles: warriors, fighters, clerics, magicians, rogues, merchants, hunters, and sorcerers. Those blessed with extraordinary power are divided into three types: royalty, heroes, and sages. But for the majority of the population, they have no such powers and live by farming or running shops. Towns are developed by those with the weakest role: villagers. For the powerless villagers going out to hunt monsters is equivalent to committing suicide. But one day, a certain two-year-old child given the role of villager notices something: once you defeat a monster… you can earn great wealth.
description.pt-br:
Este aldeão… É invencível!! Em um mundo aonde seu papel é decidido no seu nascimento, o grupo mais fraco, os aldeões, servem apenas para desenvolver as cidades. Entre tais, existe Kagami, o homem que chegou ao incrível LV 999, conhecido como ‘O Aldeão Mais Forte’! Certo dia ele encontra Alice, uma garota demônio, que pede para ele ir contra o seu destino e se aventurar pelo mundo! Assim temos o início da história do ‘fraco aldeão’!


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7612ct)

description.en: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
description.es: Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extraña proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus días de travesuras. Poco después de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra incómodo con la transformación de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. ¿Cómo cambiará esto su relación? ¡Una comedia romántica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!

description.en: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

description.en:
The battle between the Demon King and the Hero will decide the fate of the world.

Verna, the son of a nobleman, who remembered that he was reincarnated in the world of an RPG game, he was originally a mob who died without a name. The reason is probably the attack on the royal capital by the Demon King's army. Judging that, Verna mobilizes all the knowledge and wisdom of his previous life to find a way to survive in order to avoid a tragedy.Train yourself with the knowledge of the game and become friends with the Hero Mazel. The game start event "Monster Runaway Stampede".

On the battlefield where the Hero is absent, Werner shows a lion-like performance by thwarting the aim of monsters that no one has noticed, and will change the history of the game!?

 The full-fledged war fantasy of mob characters who struggle behind the legend begins here.

description.de:
Die Jagd nach dem Ainu-Gold hat begonnen…

Wir schreiben das frühe 20. Jahrhundert, kurz nach dem russisch-japanischen Krieg. Hoch im verschneiten Norden Japans schlägt sich ein einzelner Mann durch die Wildnis. Sein Name: Sugimoto, der Unsterbliche. Geplagt von den Erinnerungen an den Krieg versucht er, sein mageres Einkommen durch Goldschürferei aufzubessern – ohne Erfolg.

Aber dann erfährt er von einem riesigen Goldschatz, der einst den Ainu gestohlen wurde. Der einzige Hinweis: eine Schatzkarte, eintätowiert auf die Rücken zahlreicher Gefängnisinsassen, die sich nun auf der Flucht befinden. Gemeinsam mit dem Ainu-Mädchen Asirpa bricht Sugimoto auf die tödlichste Schatzsuche der Geschichte auf. Denn wer dieses Gold jagt, ist bereit, über Leichen zu gehen…

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.en:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
description.es:
Año 37 de la era Meiji. Tras sobrevivir a la guerra Ruso-Japonesa, Sugimoto, apodado “el Inmortal”, se une a la fiebre del oro para ayudar a la viuda de uno de sus amigos caído durante el conflicto. En su búsqueda, alguien le revela que existe un tesoro escondido y que las distintas claves para encontrarlo las llevan tatuadas en sus espaldas peligrosos convictos prófugos. En su camino se topará con Asirpa, quien no solo le salva la vida, sino que además le ayudará a sobrevivir en la dura tundra salvaje. ¡La carrera por hacerse con el tesoro ha comenzado!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.fr:
Saichi Sugimoto est une véritable légende de la guerre russo-japonaise du début du XXe siècle. Surnommé «l'Immortel,» il a survécu aux pires batailles menées dans les régions les plus sauvages qui soient. Mais quand le conflit se termine, il se retrouve seul et sans le sou… C'est alors qu'il apprend l'existence d'un fabuleux trésor de 75 kilos d'or accumulé par les Aïnous, peuple autochtone vivant en harmonie avec la nature. Hélas, le magot a été volé, puis caché par un homme désormais enfermé dans la pire prison d'Hokkaido. Les seuls indices menant au butin sont de mystérieux tatouages inscrits sur la peau de criminels évadés…

Pour Sugimoto, la chasse au trésor est lancée… Cependant, seul, il a peu de chances de s'en sortir. À peine sa quête commence-t-elle qu’il manque de se faire déchiqueter par un ours brun! Il ne doit la vie qu'à l'intervention providentielle d'Ashirpa, jeune indigène liée aux propriétaires légitimes du butin. Ils décident de faire équipe pour affronter les nombreux dangers qui les guettent sur la route de l'or des Aïnous…

Maintes fois primé au Japon, *Golden Kamui* est un formidable mélange d'aventure en milieu hostile et de découverte culturelle, le tout porté par une intrigue aux rebondissements multiples. Laissez-vous entraîner dans cette quête épique à travers les immensités sauvages d'Hokkaido!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.it:
Nel pieno dell’Era Meiji Saichi Sugimoto, ex soldato d’élite sopravvissuto a una delle battaglie più sanguinose della guerra Russo-Giapponese, lasciato l’esercito ha ormai un solo obiettivo: la corsa all’oro. È questa a portarlo in Hokkaido, l’estremo nord del Giappone abitato dal misterioso popolo degli Ainu e dove secondo una leggenda qualcuno ha nascosto una enorme quantità del prezioso metallo giallo… ma Sugimoto non è l’unico a seguire le tracce che portano al tesoro nascosto e per trovarlo dovrà affrontare spietate bande di criminali, l’esercito e il clima proibitivo dell’Hokkaido con l’aiuto di una giovane e decisa Ainu in cerca di vendetta.

---
In Hokkaido, la regione più a nord del Giappone, Sugimoto è sopravvissuto alla guerra russo-giapponese dell'epoca Meiji. Soprannominato durante la guerra "l'invincibile Sugimoto", adesso inizia la sua corsa all'oro alla ricerca delle ricchezze che gli permetteranno di salvare la moglie di un suo commilitone morto durante la guerra. Durante la ricerca s'imbatte in alcuni indizi che lasciano presagire l'esistenza una riserva d'oro gestita da criminali corrotti. Accompagnato da una ragazza Ainu che ha salvato la sua vita messa alla prova dal terribile clima del nord, i due iniziano la loro avventura contro i criminali.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.

description.ja:
『不死身の杉元』日露戦争での鬼神の如き武功から、そう謳われた兵士は、ある目的の為に大金を欲し、かつてゴールドラッシュに沸いた北海道へ足を踏み入れる。そこにはアイヌが隠した莫大な埋蔵金への手掛かりが!?　立ち塞がる圧倒的な大自然と凶悪な死刑囚。そして、アイヌの少女、エゾ狼との出逢い。『黄金を巡る生存競争』開幕ッ!!!!

description.pt:
Após feitos dignos de um guerreiro na Guerra Russo-Japonesa, o soldado conhecido como “Sugimoto, o imortal” vai para Hokkaido, onde houve a corrida do ouro, em busca de uma grande quantia de dinheiro para realizar certo objetivo. Ali, encontra pistas que levam a um grande tesouro escondido pelos ainus, mas ele precisa enfrentar também a natureza selvagem opressiva e prisioneiros violentos, assim como conhece uma garota ainu e um raro lobo-de-hokkaido. Tem início a luta pela sobrevivência em busca do ouro!!!

description.ru:
На Хоккайдо, далеко, в северных землях Японии, живёт Сугимото, переживший русско-японскую войну, и прозванный на ней Бессмертный Сугимото. Теперь он ищет богатства, обещанные золотой лихорадкой, в надежде спасти овдовевшую жену своего покойного товарища. Во время своей охоты на золото, он находит намеки на скрытый золотой склад преступников. Вместе с девушкой айну, которая некогда спасла его, они отважились на смертельное приключение против преступников, в поисках золотого тайника.

description.tr:
Sugimoto, Meiji Dönemi'nde, Japonya'nın kuzeyindeki Hokkaido'da meydana gelen Rus-Japon Savaşından sağ olarak kurtulur. Savaş boyunca "Ölümsüz Sugimoto" olarak anılan bu adam, şimdilerde savaşta ölen arkadaşının karısını kurtarma ümidi ile altınla gelen vaat edilmiş zenginliğin peşine düşer. Bu altın avcılığı süresince, yozlaşmış suçluların sakladığı altın gömüsüyle alakalı ipuçları bulur. Kötü iklim şartlarında hayatını kurtaran Auni'li bir kızla ortak olarak, altını arayan amansız suçlulara karşı ölüm-kalım mücadelesine girerler.

description.uk:
Далеко, на північних землях Хоккайдо, ветеран російсько-японської війни, за прізвиськом Суґімото "Безмертний", вирушив на пошуки багатств, обіцяні золотою лихоманкою. Загиблий товариш благав попіклуватись Сайчі про його хвору дружину, що терміново потребує гроші на лікування. Під час свого чергового невдалого полювання на золото, старий п'яниця розбовтує колишньому солдату про таємничий скарб айну, який викрав та сховав невідомий злодій. Натрапивши на слід "Безсмертний" Суґімото Сайчі розпочинає смертельну гонку з дівчинкою айну, на ім’я Асірпа.

description.vi:
Tại Hokkaido, hòn đảo xa miền cực bắc của nhật bản, nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Sugimoto Saichi trở về từ cuộc chiến tranh Nga Nhật thời kì Minh Trị. Với biệt danh "Sugimoto Bất Tử" trong chiến tranh, anh lao vào chạy theo cơn sốt vàng nhằm thực hiện ý nguyện của người bạn thân đã mất trong trận chiến

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.pt-br: Em Hokkaido, nas terras do extremo norte do Japão, Sugimoto sobreviveu à guerra russo-japonesa da era Meiji. Apelidado de "Sugimoto, o Imortal" durante a guerra, ele agora procura as riquezas prometidas pela corrida do ouro, na esperança de salvar a esposa viúva de seu falecido companheiro da guerra. Durante a sua caça ao ouro, ele descobre sobre um estoque enorme de ouro escondido por um criminoso. Através de uma parceria com uma garota da tribo Ainu, que salva a sua vida, ele luta contra os criminosos, os militares, e a própria natureza para encontrar o tesouro!
description.zh-hk:
被稱為『不死身的杉元』、在日俄戰爭中有如鬼神般的殺敵， 被世人如此熟知的杉元佐一， 為了得到大量的黃金，來到了昔日淘金熱潮盛行的北海道。 於某次機遇下，他得知了隱藏著愛奴人龐大財寶的線索!? 在充滿威嚴的大自然中， 和許多兇惡的死刑犯、以及愛奴少女相遇， 『尋找黃金的生存競爭』正式開幕!!!

description.en:
He was my best friend in the world. 
And that was enough.

Taesung and Wooyoung became best friends by chance when they were young.

Their friendship seemed to continue, even as they went to high school, but Wooyoung feels the desire to be more than just friends with Taesung.

Meanwhile, Taesung has become wary of Suhwa, who had become close to Wooyoung in high school. And an incident between Taesung and Suhwa causes a falling out between him and Wooyoung.

The two of them end up going to the same university without repairing the relationship. 

In order to rid himself of his feelings for Taesung, Wooyoung decides to cut off all contact and enlist in the army.  But he still struggles with his feelings.

After his military service, with Suhwa’s help, Wooyoung moves into an officetel, where he coincidentally reunites with Taesung…

The unrequited love which had started fresh and pure, had become gradually more intense as time passed.
Kwon Wooyoung felt like he was dying to have Go Taesung.

During the high school entrance ceremony, Koga Eito from the special class helps Kasuga Niina from her poor health. His gentle manner captivates Niina, making her confess her feeling towards him. Thus, the trials in love of this couple begin.  
  
As time passes, Niina finds it difficult to continue loving him since there are instances when he seems to be playing with her feelings. For her, going out with Koga may bring a grim future to her.

Kasuga Takao is a boy who loves reading books, particularly Baudelaire's The Flowers of Evil. A girl at his school, Saeki Nanako, is his muse and his Venus, and he admires her from a distance. One day, he forgets his copy of The Flowers of Evil in the classroom and runs back alone to pick it up. In the classroom, he finds not only his book but Saeki's gym uniform. On a mad impulse, he steals it.  
  
Now everyone knows "some pervert" stole Saeki's uniform, and Kasuga is dying with shame and guilt. Furthermore, the weird, creepy, and friendless girl of the class, Nakamura, saw him take the uniform. Instead of revealing it was him, she recognizes his kindred deviant spirit and uses her knowledge to take control of his life. Will it be possible for Kasuga to get closer to Saeki, despite Nakamura's meddling and his dark secret? What exactly does Nakamura intend to do with him?


---
Official Release:
- [Indonesian release](https://elexmedia.id/produk/serial/aku%20no%20hana-kembang%20jahanam) by Level Comics as **Aku no Hana: Kembang Jahanam** (2023)
description.uk:
Такао Касуга це простий школяр, який любить читати книжки, в особливості збірку поезій Бодлера "Квіти Зла". Він трохи зневажає своїх однокласників за те, що вони не читають книжки, а також таємно закоханий в прекрасну і милу відмінницю Нанако Саекі. Але з ними в класі вчиться повна протилежність до неї, Сава Накамура, груба і замкнена дівчина, яка зневажає і ненавидить усіх навколо неї.  
  
Одного дня у житті Такао відбувається епізод, який назавжди змінює його життя. Побачивши у Такао споріднену душу, Накамура намагається розкрити справжнє єство Такао, хоче він того, чи ні.
description.es-la: Takao Kasuga es un niño solitario que pasa sus días inmerso en libros para escapar de su frustración con la vida. Su única fuente de alegría es la hermosa Saeki, a quien admira en secreto desde lejos. Sin embargo, la obsesión de Takao va demasiado lejos un día cuando, en un momento de locura emocional, él roba la ropa de gimnasio de la niña y se la lleva a casa con él. Peor aún, su terrible obra es vista por Sawa Nakamura, una misteriosa marginada que se sienta detrás de él en clase y amenaza con revelar el secreto del niño a menos que prometa celebrar un contrato con ella. Al principio, parece que Sawa solo quiere un poco de compañía, pero pronto queda claro que este "contrato" implica más que simples charlas por la tarde. De hecho, Takao está a punto de descubrir cuán peligroso es su vínculo con Sawa y cómo amenaza con destrozar todo, su vida, su amor e incluso su cordura, aparte.
description.pt-br: Takao Kasuga é um estudante do ensino médio insociável que adora livros; em particular, Les Fleurs du Mal, de Charles Baudelaire. Ele também tem uma queda pelo ídolo de sua classe, a doce Nanako Saeki. Em forte contraste com ela, Sawa Nakamura é uma garota insolente e desagradável que não tem nenhuma preocupação com a escola. Um dia, Takao esquece de levar seu livro para casa. Ele volta à escola para recuperá-lo, mas fica parado quando encontra as roupas de ginástica recém-usadas de Nanako caídas no chão. Um desejo estranho consome Takao e, como um pervertido perverso, ele os rouba. Aku no Hana é uma história convincente de amadurecimento, centrada nos pensamentos, sentimentos e relacionamentos de Takao, enquanto ele tenta viver uma vida normal com a culpa de seu crime que pesa sobre ele. Sawa, no entanto, que testemunhou o roubo de Takao, tem outros planos para ele ...

description.en: At a tea manufacturing company, Juwon, a new employee in the product development department, falls in love with his superior, Assistant Manager Yeol, at first sight.One day, as Juwon secretly continues his unrequited love, Yeol reprimands Juwon for spraying perfume in the product development department. Juwon denies it, but Yeol continues to sniff Juwon whenever they meet, saying that he smells something.In this way, a subtle procedure called "smell inspection" has arisen between Juwon and Yeol. Juwon is troubled by the daily inspection time as his body instinctively reacting to his beloved Assistant Manager’s closeness...

The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!
description.fr: Voici l'histoire de Nanakura Rin du club de drama, ayant un talent indiscutable en tant qu'actrice, et de son senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grâce à ses talents d'actrice, Rin taquine Eiji avec multiples personnalités, lui donnant le harem dont il a toujours rêvé.
description.it: Questa è la storia di Nanakura Rin del club di teatro, che ha un talento indiscutibile come attrice, e del suo senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grazie al suo talento di attrice, Rin prende in giro Eiji con molteplici personalità, dandogli l'harem che ha sempre sognato.
description.pl:
Historia dwojga członków Klubu Teatralnego – Rin Nanakury i jej Senpaia – Kitahamy Eijiego.  
Rin, przy użyciu swoich aktorskich umiejętności, odgrywa różnorodne postacie, tworząc tym samym Senpaiowi jego wymarzony harem!
description.pt: Rin Nanakura, uma talentosa atriz do clube de teatro, e o seu veterano no mesmo clube, Eiji Kitahama. Com suas habilidade de atuação, Rin brinca com Eiji fazendo várias personagens, e montando o harém (de uma pessoa só) que ele sempre sonhou!
description.uk: Історія про Нанакуру Рін, яка має талант до акторства, та Кітахаму Ейджі - її семпая, який мріє про власний гарем.
description.pt-br: A história de Nanakura Rin do Clube de Drama, que tem talento indiscutível como atriz, e seu senpai do mesmo clube, Kitahama Eiji. Com o poder de sua atuação, Rin provoca Eiji com uma variedade de personagens, dando-lhe o harém com que ele sempre sonhou!

description.en:
A story about a delinquent boy turned into a violent magical girl.  
  
Note: Season 2 is being uploaded to the author's weibo page.  
Refer to this [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/w41PzRvz) for details and links to the season 2 raws.

altTitles.en: Till We Meet Again, My King

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

altTitles.ja: となりはふつうのニジカ（ちゃん）

altTitles.en: Next to me is the Ordinary Nijika (-chan)

description.en:
Since Aira was a little girl, boys have protected her because of her lovable appearance.

However, she never asked for their protection, or for people to gossip about how she’s so full of herself. Troublesome occurrences like those happen to her because of her appearance, so she decided that once she entered high school, she’d play the “girlish Aira” role so she wouldn’t have to deal with more bothersome situations.

One day, a person named Nijika, came to live in Aira’s house. Nijika’s family had been transferred overseas and they wanted Nijika to stay with an acquainted family they knew.

However, Aira finds out later that Nijika is actually… a guy!? Nijika who was biologically born a male, wears the clothes they want to wear, puts on the makeup they want to put on, and confidently expresses their feelings without a care in the world.

Aira doesn’t know if they are a guy, a girl, or even her friend, but one thing is certain. Aira’s extraordinary everyday life with Nijika has now started!

“You’ve manifested as a recessive Omega.”
No way…But I only came here to get a check up for a bad hangover?!
Overworked and overwhelmed with stress, Back-End Developer, Jinha, manifested as an Omega.
Jinha brews resentment for the leader of the Strategic Planning Team, Hyunjoon, and decides to open a savings account solely to save money to later hire a hitman.
But of course, bad luck comes in threes.
Now that his body is vulnerable to other’s pheromones, the only way to stabilize his body and its craving is with Hyunjoon’s refreshing pheromones.
But the only thing that Jinha can trust is Modern Medicine!
When seeking medical advice to somehow overcome his situation, the only prescription given to him as the safest method, is to have sex with someone that’s compatible and of the same gender.
Not only is Jinha feeling hopeless as he navigates through his hardship, but a stalker appears and attempts to shower him with his pheromones.
Finding himself with no other choice, Jinha asks Hyunjoon for help.

title.en: Sherbet Above the Sea of Fog

description.en:
Sherbet, a girl from a noble family, is forced to marry a man she has never met. She decides to escape this fate and joins a cruise that sails through the sea of mist, a place full of legends and secrets.

There, she meets several interesting characters, such as a pirate captain, a runaway princess, a curious mermaid and a cruel empress. She also discovers that the cruise is actually a ghost ship that takes the souls of the dead to the next world.

She will have to face various dangers and challenges to escape the ship and find her true love.

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.ja: 彼女が先輩にNTRれたので、先輩の彼女をNTRます

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend Was Stolen by My Senior, So I'll Steal His Girlfriend

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanojo ga Senpai ni Netorareta node, Senpai no Kanojo wo Netorimasu

altTitles.zh-hk: 女朋友被前輩NTR了、所以我也要NTR走前輩的女朋友

altTitles.zh: 因为被前辈PV了、所以我也要PV走前辈的女友

description.en: Yuu Isshiki, is a freshman in college. For the first time in his life, when he learned that Karen, his girlfriend was sleeping with his senior in the circle, Kamokura, he was so shocked, angered, and desperate that he called Kamokura's girlfriend, Touko, and told her with an impulse. Please have sex with me, Touko senpai! " If you get NTR-ed, then the return should be NTR as well! A topical "revenge" romantic comedy that depicts the relationship between the mind and body of four college students, a shocking story now in manga form!
description.es-la: Para hacer el cuento corto, Yuu el protagonista se entera que su novia Karen lo está engañando con un Senpai que a la vez es novio de la Chica más hermosa de la Universidad, cegado por la venganza, este la contacta y juntos idearan un plan de como vengarse.
